changeSet.author: jdavid
changeSet.comment: Add labvantageSampleType column in SampleType table
changeSet.sql: alter table `prodlims`.`sampletype` add column `labvantageSampleType` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL;

changeSet.author: jdavid
changeSet.comment: Update labvantageSampleType values for blood and saliva
changeSet.sql: update `prodlims`.`sampletype` set labvantageSampleType = 'Whole Blood' where name = 'blood'; update `prodlims`.`sampletype` set labvantageSampleType = 'Saliva' where name = 'saliva';
